remarks: Inner product with a zero second argument.  Complex version of ~ ip0r .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)
statement:
cphipcj.h $e |- ., = ( .i ` W ) $.
cphipcj.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
cphip0l.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
cphip0r $p |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ A e. V ) -> ( A ., .0. ) = 0 ) $.
